settings.content: In the first live-action chapter of the Skibidi Universe, Michael Bay brings the chaos to life. As the alliance faces a new but familiar threat, TV Woman must uncover the source before the Toilets evolve beyond control. Familiar heroes return. New warriors emerge. And everything... spirals down the drain.
settings.sub_heading: Purchase a product. Unlock the film.
settings.rich_text: Every item in this collection includes access to the film.

settings.description: Skibidi: Chapter One is a game-changing moment in entertainment. A YouTube-born series with billions of views, now directed by one of the most iconic filmmakers on Earth. Michael Bay takes the world, characters, and chaos of Skibidi and begins expanding it into something cinematic, massive, and real. This has never happened to a digital-native series before.

settings.title: HOW TO WATCH
settings.step_1_description: Buy anything from the official drop and SKIBIDI: CHAPTER ONE will be automatically added to your cart — free. No codes, no extras. Just pick your product, and the film comes with it.
settings.step_2_description: Use any major payment method: credit card, PayPal, Apple Pay, Shop Pay, or Google Pay. Make sure your billing address matches your region, and avoid VPNs — they can trigger fraud checks. You’ll also attach your order to an account via email or phone to unlock viewing access.
settings.step_3_description: Once your order is confirmed, your private stream unlocks instantly. This isn’t a rental — you can watch SKIBIDI: CHAPTER ONE as many times as you want during the premiere window. You’ll also receive an email with access instructions, so you can watch anytime.

settings.title: WHAT YOU UNLOCK
settings.column_1_title: FIRST LOOK AT THE SKIBIDI WORLD
settings.column_1_description: Unlock a 10-minute cinematic preview of the Skibidi Universe—live action, CG, and pure chaos.
settings.column_2_description: Go inside the production with Michael Bay and the VFX team behind this project—and what's coming next.
settings.column_3_title: UNIQUE TOWER UNIT FOR TOILET TOWER DEFENSE
settings.column_3_description: Along with your order confirmation, you'll receive a code via email that unlocks an exclusive unit in Toilet Tower Defense.

settings.description:
This isn’t just a team — it’s a collision of worlds. On one side: BOOM, the singular creator behind Skibidi Toilet, whose chaotic vision reshaped internet animation and built a global phenomenon with nothing but imagination and a Source Filmmaker timeline. On the other: Michael Bay, one of the top five highest-grossing filmmakers of all time — a visionary who defined what modern action and franchise storytelling looks like.

  Alongside them, a crew of legendary department heads and a new-wave digital studio are doing what Hollywood hasn’t figured out yet: blending internet-born IP with cinematic firepower. This is where the next evolution of storytelling lives — not in a boardroom, but at the intersection of viral chaos and big-screen scale.

You think this is weird? So was everything you grew up on.

SpongeBob was a talking sponge. Michelangelo was a crime-fighting turtle. Optimus Prime was a truck that gave speeches. Skibidi Toilet follows in the same footsteps, louder, and born from the internet instead of a network.

This is the next wave of character storytelling. A digital-native universe with hundreds of evolving characters, fan-built lore, creator-made episodes, Roblox integrations, and a global fandom that spans platforms and generations.

It's not random—it's the future.

Check out the most common questions from humans, Toilets, and Cameramen alike. Still confused? Reach out to us directly — whether it's a merch issue, a playback glitch, or a missing Toilet Tower code, we're here to help.
